about_the_game:
STORY

Isolated in your apartment for years the days blend together as you slowly forget the world outside your door. Visions of people you've known begin to plague you through increasingly worse hallucinations. Explore and live through each day in your apartment and face your past. You must remember their faces.

Dead Faces is a mind bending psychological horror about hallucinations and facing your past.

Unravel Jack's disturbing mind, the faces from his past and the truth behind his actions. In Dead Faces, the act of remembering may be the key to redemption or the final step toward madness.

FEATURES

  • Play through 4 select-able chapters for each individual from your past leading you to various locations and learn the truth about our protagonist Jack's twisted mind

  • A randomized dynamic hallucination system - each play through will randomly scare the player using randomized scares and transforming objects into another

  • Atmospheric realistic settings from Jack's apartment to others using photo realism and photo scanned materials to increase immersion

  • Random generated audio pooling system - the game never sounds the same and chooses from a large pool of audio randomly to keep the player paranoid throughout

  • Visual storytelling, twisted volumetric nightmarish scenery and 3D / 8D binaural audio keeps you on your toes combined with dynamic events for progression not focusing on traditional values and providing a non-linear unpredictable experience

  • A twisted macabre story surrounding the main character Jack and his past that unfolds through multiple chapters activated from mirrors in your apartment, these chapters involve different characters Jack has forgotten after being isolated for years in his apartment

  • Themes of Depression, Suicide, Isolation and a moody nightmarish atmosphere throughout the entire game - Contains gore, graphic violence, strobe lights, true volumetric lightning and other effects - play at your own risk

  • 3-4 hours of gameplay through 4 chapters

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Graphic gore, violence.
